page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: Every day I get up at about 7.30a.m. Sometimes I get dressed before breakfast. Normally I have Weetabix but sometimes Rice Krispies. Afterwards I have toast with butter and honey. When we get to school we sit on the carpet and take the register. We go into the hall for Assembly. We say 'Good Morning everyone'. We sing songs like 'Down came the Raindrops' or 'The Golden Cockerel' and say prayers. We come back into the classroom for Maths. After we have done our sums we drink our milk and go out to play. After play we do some writing in our books and some reading. Sometimes we watch Words and Pictures or Music Time on Television or we have recorder lessons. At l2o'clock one of us puts up the menu. We go into the hall for
